sentences.sentence: He was a punctilious young man.
He was punctilious about being ready and waiting in the entrance hall exactly on time.
sentences.translation: 他拘于礼数地准备妥当，按时在门厅的入口处等候。

sentences.sentence: He was as punctilious about his honour, as fine a horseman and as deep in debt as any of them.
sentences.translation: 他十分注重自己的名誉，如同一个骑士一样优秀，也和他们一样负债累累。
